channel.title: [PI] Soul Reaper
channel.description:
[size=10pt]I recently got into coding but im already getting bored with it lol. Ive been working on the Teamtorva/Torvapkz for about a month now, but as i said im getting bored and im preaty much done coding. So im just going to release it. If you couldnt tell this is my first server i ever coded, so please dont hate as i know im not that good. Thanks! :)[/size]
What ive Done: Added Balance Elemental (still needs drops added) Added Boss 2 Teleports Re-did Donator Zone Added Mod & Admin Zone Custom Shopping Area Removed object in bank at home Added ::commands interface Added ::updates Command Only Owner can spawn. (to change it from my name go to commands.java and search for "item" and put ur name) Added In-Game Stafflist (Havent done a lot, like i said only had it for a month.)
Package Download - Source/Client/Cache - Uppit: http://uppit.com/o47ojcxyr2mv/Soul_Reaper_Package.rar
Bosses: - Godwars - KBD/Frost Dragons - Dagannoth Kings - Tormented Demons - Corporeal Beast - Balance Elemental
Minigames: - Warrior's Guild - Pest Control - Barrows - Jad - Duel Arena
Miscellaneous: - Most skills fully functional - Fully Functional Summoning with Familiar special attacks, storage, and more! - Fully Functional Clan Chat - Summoning levels will not display in Wildy. - 642 Items - In-Game Highscores - Max Level is 138 - New Owner/Admin Crown
[size=13pt]Pictures:[/size]
Login: [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2ntdbna.png[/img]
Balance Elemental: [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2eaickw.png[/img]
Boss 2 Teleports: [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2u5w03d.png[/img]
::dice command: [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/o7kiyw.png[/img]
Donor Zone [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2rzsxw3.png[/img]
Mod & Admin Zone: [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2rzpdmu.png[/img]
Custom Shopping Area: [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/28v0up.png[/img]
Home Area: [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2a4z8zo.png[/img]
::commands and ::updates: [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/330eanl.png[/img]
In-game Staff list: [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/fvxs2o.png[/img]

item.title: [PI] Soul Reaper
item.dc:creator: @conja conja
item.description:
@conja wrote:

JDETSC, you can easily change the sprites if you don’t like them it’s just a matter of replacing them in the cache. It’s not that big of a deal.

OT: Very nice for a first edit, going to download to check out bank tabs.

EDIT: There aren’t bank tabs, barrows aren’t “close to real” - gf.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Soul Reaper
item.dc:creator: @blazeitup blazeitup
item.description:
@blazeitup wrote:

Yea, like i said its my first server i ever coded. Wasnt expecting to get a 10/10 or anything lol

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Soul Reaper
item.dc:creator: @JDETSC JDETSC
item.description:
@JDETSC wrote:

Sorry but it doesn’t look appealing or anything good to me.

I got to give you credit for at-least attempting to satisfy us with the content you add, but it looks rather substandard. The interfaces, objects, items, etc… Doesn’t fit that tab frame. The loginbox and loginbuttons look rather bad. The mod icon 2 looks rather bad, I mean it was edited to uglyness.

2/10

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Soul Reaper
item.dc:creator: @blazeitup blazeitup
item.description:
@blazeitup wrote:

Thanks! Everyone has their likes and dislikes

Read full topic

[size=10pt]I recently got into coding but im already getting bored with it lol.
Ive been working on the Teamtorva/Torvapkz for about a month now,
but as i said im getting bored and im preaty much done coding. So im just going to release it.
If you couldnt tell this is my first server i ever coded, so please dont hate as i know im not that good.
